GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated : 29/12/2009 
 
 
AVSEC Circular No. 21/2009 
 
 
Subject :  Ban on reception/send off ceremonies at airside of an airport. 
 
 
 
In partial modification to BCAS Circular No. 02/2008 dated 26.02.2009 
on reception/send off  ceremonies restriction at airside of an airport, it has been 
decided that Guard of Honour presented to H.E the President of India is treated 
as an exception, wherever necessary. All concerned are directed to extend full 
cooperation to the concerned State Govt. to ensure smooth conduct of Guard of 
Honour to the President of  India. 
 
 This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
